sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD ,T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_DISPLAY ,T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_SUB AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_SUB ,T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_CD ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE AS PRT_FCLTY_SE ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_NM AS PRT_FCLTY_NM ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD AS PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT AS PRT_FCLTY_UNIT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD AS PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD AS PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD ,T1.LA_CRDNT ,T1.LO_CRDNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.PRT_FCLTY_AR,0),'99,999,990.00')) AS PRT_FCLTY_AR ,T1.LAT ,T1.LNG ,TO_CHAR(T1.PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT ,T1.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT AS PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT ,T1.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER AS PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER ,T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO AS FCLTS_MNG_NO ,T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO AS FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO ,GAM_GET_PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM(T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE) AS PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM068',T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_NM ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019',T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE_NM ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM(T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) AS FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM ,GAM_GETENTRPSNM(T1.PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD,'1') AS PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_NM ,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD ,T3.GIS_ASSETS_NM ,GAM_GET_LOCPLC_LNM_SUB(T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB) AS GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC_LNM ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM002',T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) AS GIS_ASSETS_LOC_NM ,T2.PRPOS AS PRPOS ,T2.CAPA AS CAPA ,T2.VOLT AS VOLT ,T2.OUTPUT AS OUTPUT ,T2.FMT AS FMT ,T2.STNDRD AS STNDRD ,TO_CHAR(T2.INSTL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSTL_DT ,TO_CHAR(T2.MFC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MFC_DT ,T2.MFC_CMPNY AS MFC_CMPNY ,T2.MANAGER AS MANAGER ,T2.USAGE_ENTRPS AS USAGE_ENTRPS ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.DUCT_LINE_LT,0),'99,999,990.00')) AS DUCT_LINE_LT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.CABLE_EXT,0),'99,999,990.00')) AS CABLE_EXT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LIGHTWR_HT,0),'999,990.00')) AS LIGHTWR_HT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.QY,0),'99,990')) AS QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.FUEL_CONSUM,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS FUEL_CONSUM ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.FUEL_TANK,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS FUEL_TANK ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.OIL_QTY,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS OIL_QTY ,T2.FNL_MTHD AS FNL_MTHD ,T2.SPPLY_PWR AS SPPLY_PWR ,T2.SPPLY_TR AS SPPLY_TR ,T2.KOR_ELEC_SUBSTN AS KOR_ELEC_SUBSTN ,T2.SECTION_FROM AS SECTION_FROM ,T2.SECTION_TO AS SECTION_TO ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.PREMAIN_HT,0),'999,990.00')) AS PREMAIN_HT ,T2.PREMAIN_STNDRD AS PREMAIN_STNDRD ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.PREMAIN_QY,0),'99,990')) AS PREMAIN_QY ,T2.LIGHTAPP_FMT AS LIGHTAPP_FMT ,T2.LIGHTAPP_STNDRD AS LIGHTAPP_STNDRD ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LIGHTAPP_QY,0),'99,990')) AS LIGHTAPP_QY ,T2.LAMP_FMT AS LAMP_FMT ,T2.LAMP_CAPA AS LAMP_CAPA ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LAMP_QY,0),'99,990')) AS LAMP_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_QY,0),'99,990')) AS LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_QY ,T2.LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_CLCD AS LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_CLCD ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LIGHTWR_LAMP_QY,0),'99,990')) AS LIGHTWR_LAMP_QY ,T2.LIGHTWR_LAMP_CLCD AS LIGHTWR_LAMP_CLCD ,T2.RM AS RM ,T2.REG_USR AS REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T2.REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T2.UPD_USR AS UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T2.UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT ,T2.LOC AS LOC ,T2.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO AS ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO ,GAM_GET_PRT_FCLTY_NM(T2.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO) AS ARCH_FCLTS_NM ,T2.ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD AS ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM(T2.ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD) AS ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM ,NVL(T2.LOC,GAM_GET_LOCPLC_LNM_SUB(T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB)) AS PRT_FCLTY_LOC ,(CASE WHEN T2.ROWID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS FCLTY_SPEC_EXIST_YN FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ELCTY_FCLTY_SPEC_F T2 ON (T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO=T2.FCLTS_MNG_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_ASSETS_CD_F T3 ON (T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=T3.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) WHERE 1=1 AND T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'E'
AND T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo#
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND T1.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND (T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%' OR T2.LOC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%')
AND T2.ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD = #sFcltsClCd#
AND T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #sGisPrtFcltyCd#
ORDER BY T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ASC ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD ASC ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ASC ) S ) T
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ELCTY_FCLTY_SPEC_F SET PRPOS = #prpos# ,CAPA = #capa# ,VOLT = #volt# ,OUTPUT = #output# ,FMT = #fmt# ,STNDRD = #stndrd# ,INSTL_DT = TO_DATE(#instlDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,MFC_DT = TO_DATE(#mfcDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,MFC_CMPNY = #mfcCmpny# ,MANAGER = #manager# ,USAGE_ENTRPS = #usageEntrps# ,DUCT_LINE_LT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#ductLineLt#,',','')),0) ,CABLE_EXT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#cableExt#,',','')),0) ,LIGHTWR_HT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lightwrHt#,',','')),0) ,QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#qy#,',','')),0) ,FUEL_CONSUM = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#fuelConsum#,',','')),0) ,FUEL_TANK = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#fuelTank#,',','')),0) ,OIL_QTY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#oilQty#,',','')),0) ,FNL_MTHD = #fnlMthd# ,SPPLY_PWR = #spplyPwr# ,SPPLY_TR = #spplyTr# ,KOR_ELEC_SUBSTN = #korElecSubstn# ,SECTION_FROM = #sectionFrom# ,SECTION_TO = #sectionTo# ,PREMAIN_HT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#premainHt#,',','')),0) ,PREMAIN_STNDRD = #premainStndrd# ,PREMAIN_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#premainQy#,',','')),0) ,LIGHTAPP_FMT = #lightappFmt# ,LIGHTAPP_STNDRD = #lightappStndrd# ,LIGHTAPP_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lightappQy#,',','')),0) ,LAMP_FMT = #lampFmt# ,LAMP_CAPA = #lampCapa# ,LAMP_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lampQy#,',','')),0) ,LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lightwrLightappQy#,',','')),0) ,LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_CLCD = #lightwrLightappClcd# ,LIGHTWR_LAMP_QY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lightwrLampQy#,',','')),0) ,LIGHTWR_LAMP_CLCD = #lightwrLampClcd# ,RM = #rm# ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE ,LOC = #loc# ,ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO = #archFcltsMngNo# ,ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD = #elctyFcltsClCd# WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD ,T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_DISPLAY ,T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_SUB AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_SUB ,T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_CD ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE AS PRT_FCLTY_SE ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_NM AS PRT_FCLTY_NM ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD AS PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT AS PRT_FCLTY_UNIT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD AS PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD AS PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD ,T1.LA_CRDNT ,T1.LO_CRDNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.PRT_FCLTY_AR,0),'99,999,990.00')) AS PRT_FCLTY_AR ,T1.LAT ,T1.LNG ,TO_CHAR(T1.PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT ,T1.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT AS PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT ,T1.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER AS PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER ,T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO AS FCLTS_MNG_NO ,T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO AS FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO ,GAM_GET_PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM(T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE) AS PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM068',T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_NM ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019',T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE_NM ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM(T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) AS FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM ,GAM_GETENTRPSNM(T1.PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD,'1') AS PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_NM ,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD ,T3.GIS_ASSETS_NM ,GAM_GET_LOCPLC_LNM_SUB(T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB) AS GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC_LNM ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM002',T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) AS GIS_ASSETS_LOC_NM ,T2.PRPOS AS PRPOS ,T2.CAPA AS CAPA ,T2.VOLT AS VOLT ,T2.OUTPUT AS OUTPUT ,T2.FMT AS FMT ,T2.STNDRD AS STNDRD ,TO_CHAR(T2.INSTL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSTL_DT ,TO_CHAR(T2.MFC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MFC_DT ,T2.MFC_CMPNY AS MFC_CMPNY ,T2.MANAGER AS MANAGER ,T2.USAGE_ENTRPS AS USAGE_ENTRPS ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.DUCT_LINE_LT,0),'99,999,990.00')) AS DUCT_LINE_LT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.CABLE_EXT,0),'99,999,990.00')) AS CABLE_EXT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LIGHTWR_HT,0),'999,990.00')) AS LIGHTWR_HT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.QY,0),'99,990')) AS QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.FUEL_CONSUM,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS FUEL_CONSUM ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.FUEL_TANK,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS FUEL_TANK ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.OIL_QTY,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS OIL_QTY ,T2.FNL_MTHD AS FNL_MTHD ,T2.SPPLY_PWR AS SPPLY_PWR ,T2.SPPLY_TR AS SPPLY_TR ,T2.KOR_ELEC_SUBSTN AS KOR_ELEC_SUBSTN ,T2.SECTION_FROM AS SECTION_FROM ,T2.SECTION_TO AS SECTION_TO ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.PREMAIN_HT,0),'999,990.00')) AS PREMAIN_HT ,T2.PREMAIN_STNDRD AS PREMAIN_STNDRD ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.PREMAIN_QY,0),'99,990')) AS PREMAIN_QY ,T2.LIGHTAPP_FMT AS LIGHTAPP_FMT ,T2.LIGHTAPP_STNDRD AS LIGHTAPP_STNDRD ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LIGHTAPP_QY,0),'99,990')) AS LIGHTAPP_QY ,T2.LAMP_FMT AS LAMP_FMT ,T2.LAMP_CAPA AS LAMP_CAPA ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LAMP_QY,0),'99,990')) AS LAMP_QY ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_QY,0),'99,990')) AS LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_QY ,T2.LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_CLCD AS LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_CLCD ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LIGHTWR_LAMP_QY,0),'99,990')) AS LIGHTWR_LAMP_QY ,T2.LIGHTWR_LAMP_CLCD AS LIGHTWR_LAMP_CLCD ,T2.RM AS RM ,T2.REG_USR AS REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T2.REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T2.UPD_USR AS UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T2.UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT ,T2.LOC AS LOC ,T2.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO AS ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO ,GAM_GET_PRT_FCLTY_NM(T2.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO) AS ARCH_FCLTS_NM ,T2.ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD AS ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM(T2.ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD) AS ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM ,NVL(T2.LOC,GAM_GET_LOCPLC_LNM_SUB(T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB)) AS PRT_FCLTY_LOC ,(CASE WHEN T2.ROWID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS FCLTY_SPEC_EXIST_YN FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ELCTY_FCLTY_SPEC_F T2 ON (T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO=T2.FCLTS_MNG_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_ASSETS_CD_F T3 ON (T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=T3.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) WHERE T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #gisPrtFcltyCd# AND T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ = #gisPrtFcltySeq# AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE = #prtFcltySe#

SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(*),0),'999,999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_COUNT ,TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(T2.QY),0),'999,999,999,999,999') AS SUM_QY ,TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(T2.OIL_QTY),0),'999,999,999,999,999') AS SUM_OIL_QTY ,TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(T2.FUEL_CONSUM),0),'999,999,999,999,999') AS SUM_FUEL_CONSUM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ELCTY_FCLTY_SPEC_F T2 ON (T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO=T2.FCLTS_MNG_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_ASSETS_CD_F T3 ON (T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=T3.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) WHERE 1=1 AND T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'E'
AND T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo#
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND T1.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND (T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%' OR T2.LOC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%')
AND T2.ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD = #sFcltsClCd#
AND T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #sGisPrtFcltyCd#

SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_NUMBER(MAX(T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ)),0) + 1,'0000')) AS MAX_GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F T1 WHERE T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #gisPrtFcltyCd# AND T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE = #prtFcltySe#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F SET PRT_FCLTY_NM = #prtFcltyNm# ,PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD = #prtFcltyStndrd# ,PRT_FCLTY_UNIT = #prtFcltyUnit# ,PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT = TO_DATE(#prtFcltyInstlDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT = TO_DATE(#prtFcltyChangeDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE ,PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD = #prtFcltyMngEntrpsCd# ,PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD = #prtFcltyGisCd# ,LA_CRDNT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#laCrdnt#,',','')),0) ,LO_CRDNT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#loCrdnt#,',','')),0) ,PRT_FCLTY_AR = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#prtFcltyAr#,',','')),0) ,LAT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lat#,',','')),0) ,LNG = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lng#,',','')),0) ,PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT = TO_DATE(#prtFcltyExprDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT = #prtPrtFcltyCnt# ,PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER = #prtPrtFcltyMnger# ,GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_SUB = #gisPrtFcltyCdSub# ,FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo# ,FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# WHERE GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #gisPrtFcltyCd# AND GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ = #gisPrtFcltySeq# AND GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND PRT_FCLTY_SE = #prtFcltySe#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #gisPrtFcltyCd# AND GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ = #gisPrtFcltySeq# AND GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND PRT_FCLTY_SE = #prtFcltySe#
sqlMap.select: SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
SELECT ENTRPS_NM FROM ENTRPS_INFO_F WHERE ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_CL_CD = #sFcltsClCd#
SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD ,FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_JOB_SE = 'E' AND LEAF_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY FCLTS_CL_CD
SELECT PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo#

SELECT TO_CHAR(T1.DIR_NO) AS DIR_NO ,T1.DIR_NM AS DIR_NM ,T1.DIR_PATH AS DIR_PATH ,TO_CHAR(T1.DIR_UPPER_NO) AS DIR_UPPER_NO ,TO_CHAR(T1.DEPTH_SORT) AS DEPTH_SORT ,T1.LEAF_YN AS LEAF_YN ,T1.FCLTS_JOB_SE AS DIR_FCLTS_JOB_SE ,T1.REG_USR AS REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR AS UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT FROM ATCH_FILE_DIR_F T1 WHERE T1.DIR_NO = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',','')),0)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ATCH_FILE_DIR_F ( DIR_NO ,DIR_NM ,DIR_PATH ,DIR_UPPER_NO ,DEPTH_SORT ,LEAF_YN ,FCLTS_JOB_SE ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',','')) ,#dirNm# ,#dirPath# ,TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirUpperNo#,',','')) ,TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#depthSort#,',','')) ,#leafYn# ,#dirFcltsJobSe# ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ATCH_FILE_DIR_F SET DIR_NM = #dirNm# ,DIR_PATH = #dirPath# ,DIR_UPPER_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirUpperNo#,',','')) ,DEPTH_SORT = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#depthSort#,',','')) ,LEAF_YN = #leafYn# ,FCLTS_JOB_SE = #dirFcltsJobSe# ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE DIR_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',',''))
UPDATE ATCH_FILE_DIR_F SET LEAF_YN = 'N' WHERE DIR_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirUpperNo#,',',''))

UPDATE ATCH_FILE_DIR_F SET LEAF_YN = ( SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) FROM ATCH_FILE_DIR_F WHERE DIR_UPPER_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirUpperNo#,',','')) AND DIR_NO <> TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',','')) ) WHERE DIR_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirUpperNo#,',',''))
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM ATCH_FILE_DIR_F WHERE DIR_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',',''))

DELETE FROM ATCH_FILE_DIR_F WHERE DIR_NO IN ( SELECT DIR_NO FROM ATCH_FILE_DIR_F WHERE DIR_NO > TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',','')) START WITH DIR_UPPER_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',','')) CONNECT BY DIR_UPPER_NO = PRIOR DIR_NO )
sqlMap.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(ATCH_FILE_DIR_SEQ.NEXTVAL) AS NEW_DIR_NO FROM DUAL

SELECT COUNT(*) AS LOWER_DATA_CNT FROM ATCH_FILE_DIR_F WHERE DIR_NO IN ( SELECT DIR_NO FROM ATCH_FILE_DIR_F WHERE DIR_NO > TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',','')) START WITH DIR_UPPER_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',','')) CONNECT BY DIR_UPPER_NO = PRIOR DIR_NO )

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(T1.ATCH_FILE_NO) AS ATCH_FILE_NO ,T1.ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC AS ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC ,T1.ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL AS ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL ,T1.ATCH_FILE_SE AS ATCH_FILE_SE ,TO_CHAR(T1.DIR_NO) AS ATCH_FILE_DIR_NO ,T1.FCLTS_DATA_SE AS ATCH_FILE_FCLTS_DATA_SE ,T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO AS ATCH_FILE_FCLTS_MNG_NO ,T1.FCLTS_JOB_SE AS ATCH_FILE_FCLTS_JOB_SE ,TO_CHAR(T1.FCLTS_MNG_SEQ) AS ATCH_FILE_FCLTS_MNG_SEQ ,T1.REG_USR AS REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR AS UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT ,GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(T1.ATCH_FILE_SE) AS ATCH_FILE_SE_NM FROM FCLTS_ATCH_FILE_F T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.DIR_NO = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#atchFileDirNo#,',','')),0)
ORDER BY T1.ATCH_FILE_NO ASC ) S ) T
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FCLTS_ATCH_FILE_F ( ATCH_FILE_NO ,ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC ,ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL ,ATCH_FILE_SE ,DIR_NO ,FCLTS_DATA_SE ,FCLTS_MNG_NO ,FCLTS_JOB_SE ,FCLTS_MNG_SEQ ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#atchFileNo#,',','')) ,#atchFileNmLogic# ,#atchFileNmPhysicl# ,#atchFileSe# ,TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#atchFileDirNo#,',','')) ,#atchFileFcltsDataSe# ,#atchFileFcltsMngNo# ,#atchFileFcltsJobSe# ,TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#atchFileFcltsMngSeq#,',','')) ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FCLTS_ATCH_FILE_F SET ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC = #atchFileNmLogic# ,ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL = #atchFileNmPhysicl# ,ATCH_FILE_SE = #atchFileSe# ,DIR_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#atchFileDirNo#,',','')) ,FCLTS_DATA_SE = #atchFileFcltsDataSe# ,FCLTS_MNG_NO = #atchFileFcltsMngNo# ,FCLTS_JOB_SE = #atchFileFcltsJobSe# ,FCLTS_MNG_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#atchFileFcltsMngSeq#,',','')) ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE ATCH_FILE_NO = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#atchFileNo#,',','')),0)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FCLTS_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE ATCH_FILE_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#atchFileNo#,',',''))

DELETE FROM FCLTS_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE DIR_NO IN ( SELECT DIR_NO FROM ATCH_FILE_DIR_F WHERE DIR_NO > TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#atchFileDirNo#,',','')) START WITH DIR_UPPER_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#atchFileDirNo#,',','')) CONNECT BY DIR_UPPER_NO = PRIOR DIR_NO )
sqlMap.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(T1.ATCH_FILE_NO) AS ATCH_FILE_NO ,T1.ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC AS ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC ,T1.ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL AS ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL ,T1.ATCH_FILE_SE AS ATCH_FILE_SE ,TO_CHAR(T1.DIR_NO) AS ATCH_FILE_DIR_NO ,T1.FCLTS_DATA_SE AS ATCH_FILE_FCLTS_DATA_SE ,T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO AS ATCH_FILE_FCLTS_MNG_NO ,T1.FCLTS_JOB_SE AS ATCH_FILE_FCLTS_JOB_SE ,TO_CHAR(T1.FCLTS_MNG_SEQ) AS ATCH_FILE_FCLTS_MNG_SEQ ,T1.REG_USR AS REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR AS UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT ,GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(T1.ATCH_FILE_SE) AS ATCH_FILE_SE_NM FROM FCLTS_ATCH_FILE_F T1 WHERE T1.ATCH_FILE_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#atchFileNo#,',',''))
SELECT TO_CHAR(FCLTS_ATCH_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL) AS NEW_DIR_NO FROM DUAL
